omopColumns.name: nhs_number
omopColumns.query:
select
	NHS_NUMBER,
	EVENT,
	EVENT_START_DT_TM,
	RESULT_VALUE,
	RESULT_UNITS,
	NORMAL_LOW,
	NORMAL_HIGH
from ##duckdb_source##
